poem.title: Alphabetical psalm (for Pietro Cardines)
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Nun: The yoke of his bones weighed down on him The wife never sent a chaplain. The widow Left him to the mortuary and the dead. Only one relative Saw him lifted from the slab - In parachute silk? For the airforce had got wind of this And a guard of honour came. And no one wept in church, except One officer, who couldn't stop. What got to him? What Was his name? The frailty Of the fighting man.
